messages.Drag a track here and start random liste: Drag a track here and start random listening
messages.Drag a track here to remove it: Drag a track here to remove it
messages.Drag a playlist here to remove it: Drag a playlist here to remove it
messages.Are you sure to reset all settings?: Are you sure to reset all settings?
messages.Drag & Drop you files or Browse: Drag & Drop you files or Browse
messages.The audio source doesn't provide a playb: The audio source doesn't provide a playback URL for this track.
messages.The playback URL provided by the audio s: The playback URL provided by the audio source is not valid/reachable.
messages.The audio format of the playback source: The audio format of the playback source is not supported.
The connection to the server is slow.
messages.The connection to the server is unstable: The connection to the server is unstable.
messages.Select the \"Listen Randomly\" playlist: Select the "Listen Randomly" playlist to start playing random tracks pushed by the app.
messages.Pick up a visualization effect from the: Pick up a visualization effect from the drop-down on the control bar (visualization may be inactive with slow network).
messages.Detailed preference settings available v: Detailed preference settings available via the gear icon on the control bar.
messages.If the battery runs out fast on mobile d: If the battery runs out fast on mobile devices, please adjust the power option under "Settings" (some changes may require restarting the App for now).
messages.More features are under continuous devel: More features are under continuous development.
